ticket_summary: Update claim amount in claims_medical table for specific member and claim details.

solution_step.description: Update the claim_amount for the specified claim in the claims_medical table.
solution_step.details: Set claim_amount to 100000.00 where member_id='MEM101', CLAIM_ID='CLM101', provider_id='PRV051', and service_date='2024-04-24'
